name: places/ChIJD8n158FYwokRLcvFzsqw6Nc
formattedAddress: 300 E 71st St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 300 E 71st St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: By far the worst attitude I've encountered in a parking attendant. The only communication I got was grunts and annoyed looks. Park here if you want to be rushed in and out while having someone stare at you like you punched their mom.

text.text: By far the worst attitude I've encountered in a parking attendant. The only communication I got was grunts and annoyed looks. Park here if you want to be rushed in and out while having someone stare at you like you punched their mom.

originalText.text: Attendant damage my car, I made an appointment to view camera because they claimed they didn’t damage the car.  Meet with Andres Mejia (he arrives 30 mins late) then pulls up  photos of my car that was NOT clear and not date stamped. When we asked to see videos he skim through them. The entire time he seems very nervous and clearly trying to hide that my car was not damage before I entered. I explained that we would like to see the video of me driving in the day before to compare with video of me coming in the day he claims I had damage. He becomes angry shuts his laptop and said  he is not showing us any more videos and he has things to do. He ends by yelling if we want just  take them to court. He is very rude and clearly knows that they damage my car.

originalText.text: Awful awful awful . If I could give 0 stars, I would. Dishonest attendant who cost me an hour of my already difficult day just to pickup a prepaid car. He wouldn’t hand over my keys, & ripped me off by $20 on a prearranged agreed price while laughing in my face. I coughed it up at the end just so I could get out of there. Never again, humanity at its worse!
